title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Expt. No.Titles of Experiments1Carbothermic reduction of Lead Sulphide.2Alluminothermic reduction of Lead Sulphide.3Investigations of the equilibrium of C, CO and CO2.4Oxidation kinetics of Copper at elevated temperatures.5Thermodynamic studies on thermal decomposition of CaCO3.6Estimation of activity from EMF measurements.7Estimation of partial molal volume in binary solutions.8Determination of O2 solubility in Ag at high temperature.9Determination of Cd-Zn phase diagram by DSC.
